alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 9:37PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to flood stage by Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
